website_summaries.verdict: The novelty of having an illuminated toilet at 3am makes those nighttime trips to the bathroom much easier, but it’s the bacteria-blasting ultraviolet cleaning mode that gives this toilet light additional long term value.
pros: LED toilet light with 8 color settings
Powerful UV-C light kills bacteria during cleaning cycle
Motion activation and light sensitive options
cons: This model requires 3 AAA batteries, but they are sold separately

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors. Makes it easy to find the toilet in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool product. It has a motion detector so if you need to use the bathroom in the middle of the night and need to find the toilet, the light comes on and you will have an easy time. They are mild lights too so it won’t hurt your eyes when they come on and ruin your night vision. You also don’t have to worry about turning any lights off when you’re done because the light turns off by itself after 2 min of no motion being detected. The sterilizing uv light is a big plus as well. Who knew I’d be so excited about accessorizing my toilet of all things.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Quality of life for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup, and i like the fact that they include a small screw driver with it to open the battery compartment, it's very intuitive because i had problem waking up at night and turning the lights on which takes the sleep away from my eyes. but this is a life changer for me, it works as intended and lights up when i get near the toilet , without shinning bright light in my face. i'm only giving it 4 stars because it's a little bit bulky and keeps sticking out while sitting on the toilet
customer_reviews.author: Lashello

customer_reviews.title: They survived the plunge
customer_reviews.text: I've have used this toilet night light for over a year. I haven't needed to change the battery at all since January when it was purchased. Recently when cleaning the toilet my night light fell in. It was completely submerged, thankfully in a clean toilet! I waited 2 days before putting it back and it worked like nothing ever happened! Very happy with this purchase needless to say :)

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: This little device does what it says....it clings to the side of the toilet bowl and comes on when it senses movement. The sensor seems to be sensitive enough for a normal person and the light will change colors if you choose to set it that way. It claims to have an ultraviolet cleaning cycle, and I have seen it when it was on, but if it actually works that would be a plus. The downside to me is that when a person raises the seat to urinate the light is extremely bright. It works best if the toilet seat is down so it isn't blindingly bright.

product_meta.title: ROYFACC 8 Colors LED Toilet Light Motion Detection Bathroom Night Lights Sensitive Dusk to Dawn Battery-Operated Lamp with UV-C Light
feature_bullets: UV-C Light: Great help for clean toilet bowl, Great helpful for your kids' and family. Safe, natural and without the use of chemicals. Let the sunshine be every corner in the toilet.
Motion-Activated: Automatically turn on once you get close to the range about 2-3 meters of your toilet. The sensor duration is about 120 seconds.
Light Sensitive: It turns off as soon as a bright enough light is turned on nearby. More, it will not light up in day time for saving the energy.

No more stumbling around in the dark! No more messy cleanups! No more falling in the bathroom.Fits ANY Toilet in Seconds: A metal arm that can be bent (over bend it a bit so it caches on the bowl firmly) to fit any toilet.

Color Change: It runs its rotation where each color will show for about 4 seconds then change to the next with smooth transition. Color rotate or set with Blue, Red, Green, Sky blue, Purple, Yellow, Pink, or White.ROYFACC toilet nightlight powered by 3 X AAA batteries(NOT include): No more worrying about the power fails.
